name: wallos
description: Wallos is a self-hosted subscription management app that tracks recurring expenses. It shows cost breakdowns, renewal dates, and categories in a clean, mobile-friendly interface.
features: Subscription tracking: Monitor all recurring expenses including streaming services, software licenses, and memberships in one place.
Cost breakdown: View total monthly, yearly, and lifetime costs with automatic calculations and currency conversion.
Renewal reminders: Get notified before subscriptions renew to decide whether to continue or cancel services.
Category organization: Group subscriptions by type such as entertainment, productivity, or utilities for better oversight.
Payment method tracking: Associate subscriptions with specific credit cards or payment methods to manage billing.
Price history: Track subscription price changes over time to identify cost increases and optimize spending.
Spending analytics: Visualize subscription costs with charts and graphs showing spending patterns and trends.
Multi-currency support: Handle subscriptions in different currencies with automatic conversion to your base currency.
Custom billing cycles: Support monthly, yearly, quarterly, or custom billing periods for accurate cost tracking.
Export reports: Generate spending reports in PDF or CSV format for budgeting or expense reimbursement.
Mobile responsive: Manage subscriptions on the go with a fully responsive interface optimized for smartphones.
Privacy focused: Keep financial data private on your own server without sharing with third-party services.
